title: Clicking the Reconnect button and it takes you back to reconnect button screen again
body: Every time I try to join a game it instantly puts me back to the client and requests I click the reconnect button.  I clicked the reconnect button and it just loads for a second and pops me back into the client with the button again.  Anyone know how to solve this issue?

replies.body: Your network might be having a really hard time getting any sort of response from the game servers if you can't ever seem to reconnect. If this keeps happening and you haven't been able to get reconnected to any games, do me a favor and update your DNS and port forwarding settings using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a guide! Test those in a custom game, and let me know if it seems to help or not.

I am having the same issue, and every time I see a reply to this issue, it's always a link to the connection guide. So I would like to state for the record that this is NOT an connection issue and I know of a few people that have started experiencing this problem in the past few days. please look a little deeper into this thank you. =)
Same problem here, have had the problem for over a few days now, posted in a few threads before this with people having the same problem.

Have you tried letting it just sit there for a few? When I get disconnected from a game and (when I can finally) relog back in, my client always auto-reconnects me.
If that isn't working, make sure your firewall is allowing the process (League...anything related to League) to go through / be accepted.
